name: Drift Conversational Marketing
description: Integrate with Drift Conversational Marketing to list, send, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Conversations
tools.description: List conversations from Drift. Returns conversation IDs, statuses, and contact information.

tools.name: Send Message
tools.description: Send a message in a Drift conversation. Can send as a user (agent) or post a chat message.

tools.name: List Contacts
tools.description: List contacts from Drift. Returns contact names, emails, and companies.

tools.name: Get Conversation
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific Drift conversation, including its messages.

tools.name: Create Contact
tools.description: Create a new contact in Drift. Provide at least an email address.
